author: MUHAMMAD IKHSAN MAHAR dari Doha, Qatar
title: Defeating Vietnam, Indonesia Wakes Up from Double Nightmare - Kompas.id
text: [›](/) [English](/kategori/english)›Defeating Vietnam, Indonesia... Defeating Vietnam, Indonesia Wakes Up from Double Nightmare Indonesia maintains its chance of qualifying for the knockout phase of the 2023 Asian Cup after silencing Vietnam, 1-0. The bad record was broken. About AI Translated Article Please note that this article was automatically translated using Microsoft Azure AI, Open AI, and Google Translation AI. We cannot ensure that the entire content is translated accurately. If you spot any errors or inconsistencies, contact us at [hotline@kompas.id](mailto:hotline@kompas.id), and we'll make every effort to address them. Thank you for your understanding. The following article was translated using both Microsoft Azure Open AI and Google Translation AI. The original article can be found in [Kalahkan Vietnam, Indonesia Bangun dari Mimpi Buruk Ganda](https://www.kompas.id/baca/olahraga/2024/01/20/kalahkan-vietnam-indonesia-bangun-dari-mimpi-buruk-ganda) DOHA, KOMPAS - Indonesia has awoken from two nightmares thanks to their 1-0 victory over Vietnam in the second match of Group D in the 2023 Asian Cup on Friday evening at Abdullah bin Khalifa Stadium in Doha. This positive achievement opens up the opportunity for Indonesia to fulfill their target of advancing to the round of 16.
